summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 SAAB 9-3. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V063000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE CONTACT WAS NOT ABLE TO GET THE RECALL COMPLETED DUE TO THE DEALERS REFUSAL TO PERFORM THE RECALL ON THEIR MODEL OF VEHICLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE DON KAY DEALER WAS CONTACTED AND THEY WERE INFORMED THAT THE VEHICLE MUST BE TAKEN TO A SAAB APPROVED REPAIR CENTER AND THE CLOSEST ONE WAS 300 MILES AWAY. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
